name: Blockworks Daily
title: A New Crypto Bubble Inflates Ai Agents
text:
Synopsis
A new crypto bubble is forming around AI agents, with potential for massive market expansion driven by speculative narratives and emerging technological capabilities.

Key Insights
- AI agent crypto tokens currently represent only $15 billion of market cap, with potential to grow to hundreds of billions
- Two leading AI agent infrastructure platforms are ai16z ($2.4 billion) and Virtuals ($4.1 billion)
- VanEck predicts over one million AI agents will be onchain by 2025
- Sam Altman predicts AI agents may "join the workforce" and materially change company output in 2025
- Investors are betting on the narrative and potential of AI agents rather than current utility
- Some crypto investors believe AI agents could potentially replace websites in the social media age
- The sector is seen as potentially forming "the biggest bubble we've ever seen in crypto"
- Successful crypto investment strategy historically involves buying into emerging narratives early
